A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It broke my heart watching this. After 40 years since I saw the first Star Wars film\, the dream is finally over. I thought that JJ Abrams had rescued it from the jaws of defeat and I was wrong. Like many\, Star Wars was a revalation to me as a young boy\, and eventually inspired me to work in the movie Industry\, which I was in for 10 years (I even got to work at Elstree Studios where the beloved Empire was shot!). The Last Jedi? The last Star Wars film. (And I say that loosley).  Alas now\, the journey has come to an end. With a tear in my eye\, I'm saying goodbye to the franchise. RIP Star Wars.
